policyDescription: At DeepDive, we are committed to protecting our users' privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when using our hotel and reservation management platform. By registering and using DeepDive, you agree to this privacy policy.
section1-1: When you use DeepDive, we may collect the following information:
section1-2: Personal Information: name, gender, email, phone number, date of birth, passport, and address.
section1-3: Account Data: login information such as username and password.
section1-4: Reservation Information: details about your reservations, such as total price and check-in/check-out dates.
section1-5: Technical Data: IP address, device type, operating system, and browsers used to access DeepDive.
section2-1: We use your personal information for the following purposes:
section2-2: To manage your account and provide user support.
section2-3: To process and manage accommodation bookings.
section2-4: To personalize your experience on the platform.
section2-5: To communicate with you about updates, promotions, or changes to our policies.
section2-6: To improve our services and perform usage analysis.
section2-7: To ensure security and prevent fraudulent activities.
section3-1: We may share your personal information with third parties in the following circumstances:
section3-2: With service providers who help us process payments, manage data, or send communications.
section3-3: With accommodation owners to complete and manage your booking.
section3-4: When required by law, such as complying with a court order.
section3-5: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, in which case your information may be transferred to the new entity.
section4-1: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, loss, misuse, or disclosure. However, no security system is foolproof, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data.
section5-1: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
section5-2: Access: you can request access to the personal data we store about you.
section5-3: Correction: you can request that we correct any inaccurate or incomplete information.
section5-4: Restriction: you can request that we limit the processing of your information in certain circumstances.
section5-5: To exercise these rights, contact us at deepdivesl.contact@gmail.com.
section6-1: DeepDive uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on the platform. You can adjust your browser settings to disable cookies, but this may affect the application's functionality.
section7-1: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal reasons. We encourage you to review this page periodically to stay informed.
section8-1: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, you can contact us at deepdivesl.contact@gmail.com.
section8-2: Thank you for trusting DeepDive to manage your bookings and accommodations.
